Missing Address: When viewing your list, click the "…" in the upper right hand corner. From there click "Manage List" which will give you a few options including “Shipping Address”. com:
Sin City has become famous, and infamous, for its signature high contrast black and white art style which was done by simplifying negative space and composition.

To /co/, are you aware of any other comic utilize this kind of style. The only one I'm aware of is Channel Zero by Brian Wood and MAYBE Johnny the Homicidal Maniac, but that's REALLY stretching it.

One stipulation: It has to be in black and white though, NEVER colorized, so as much as I'd like to put 100 Bullets after seeing the original artwork by Eduardo Russo, it's in color, so no.

Also, no greyscale, so the walking dead DOES NOT count.

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>134414010
In the first direct-to-video movie Bender's Big Score Fry states he's been in love with Leela "since the day [he] came to the future". I know that some people took that as a retcon of the pilot as if Fry and Leela's meeting was "love at first sight". Fry's statement is still true without retroactively changing continuity. It wasn't love at first sight, it was lust. I would say the moment Fry fell in love with Leela was when the two had the heart-to-heart in the ruins of Old New York later that day. When Leela's hand touched Fry's hand is the moment the two fell in love with each other. Neither of the two realized it at the time, but the seeds were planted. The first season established a deep non-romantic bond between the two such as when the two sheltered inside the lunar lander in "The Series Has Landed" and Leela putting herself in danger to save Fry in "My Three Suns". The episode "A Farewell to Remember" had Fry pretending to be Leela's fiance that culminated with the two almost kissing.

The second season had a few more moments leaning more towards a romantic relationship between the two. The season premiere "I Second that Emotion" has Leela claiming she loves every living creature. Fry asks "even [him]" to which Leela replies "as a friend". Fry curses in disappointment, meaning that he likely wanted to explore a romantic component to their relationship. There's quite a few episodes that focus on the close relationship between the two and did have another almost kiss in "Xmas Story". "Anthology of Interest [I]" shows that the two would sleep together if Leela was more impulsive. Leela, too, did seem excited about learning that Fry had a crush on her in a late season 2 episode "War is the H-Word". So while Fry did admit to crushing on Leela, Leela too had a slight bit of romantic interest in Fry as well.

com:
>What is this thread?
Every Wins'day at Win-O'-Clock we gather here and post links to the latest scans and rips of comic books.
Most links we uploaded ourselves, others we are sharing from elsewhere.
Some comics we've even purchased ourselves (but most we didn't).
If you'd like to help out, just ask and we would be delighted to tell you how.
Otherwise, be patient, be polite, and understand the simple concept behind these words: Not posted means not available yet.

>Where can I find old Win-O'-Threads?
http://desuarchive.org/co/search/subject/Official%20Win-O'-Thread/
http://boards.fireden.net/co/search/subject/Official%20Win-O'-Thread/
(Note: This finds the OP for old threads. If you want to search for comics in the archive, clear the subject field!)

>Where can I find downloads for other comics?
Warez forums/blogs, DDL-indexing search engines (like FilesLoop), torrent trackers (like 1337x) and other P2P networks (like DC++).
If a link has been posted on 4chan, you can search for it in the Desu archive (add "http*" to searches to return only posts with links).
If all else fails, just >buy it.

>Where can I buy comics?
http://www.amazon.com/
On the various publishers' webstores, and at your local comics shop.

>Where can I find an LCS?
http://www.comicshoplocator.com/

>Where can I find out when new comics are released?
http://www.comiclist.com/index.php
http://www.previewsworld.com

>How do I download from websites that only give me .exe files?
Untick the checkbox under the download button.

>How can I find this thread every week?
If you are using the inline extension go to http://4chan.org/co/official or use the option under "Filters & Post Hiding".
If you have 4chanX go to Settings > Filter > Subject and add the following line:
/Official Win-O'-Thread/;highlight

Luck got a low score and it's a kids movie. This has nothing to do with being generous to kids movies, your first two examples get a ton of points taken off for being BIG disappointments.
